https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/klefflLs0IekwA0zuRXt8rX9caZ.jpg In an industrial town in Mexico near the US border, hundreds of women have been sexually abused and murdered. As the body count continues to rise, a web of corruption unfolds that reaches the highest levels of Mexican society. Bajo Juárez: The City Devouring Its Daughters
